headline.main: 2-Time Defending Champion Cuevas Goes for 3 in Brazil Open
headline.print_headline: 2-Time Defending Champion Cuevas Goes for 3 in Brazil Open

lead_paragraph: Two-time defending champion Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay can make it three straight in the Brazil Open after beating top-seeded Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain in the semifinals 6-3, 7-6 (2) on Saturday.
snippet: Two-time defending champion Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay can make it three straight in the Brazil Open after beating top-seeded Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain in the semifinals 6-3, 7-6 (2) on Saturday....
